title: I reported a player for inting (going 0/22 on zilean). 10 days later I check back and he isnt banned
body:
And no, person I know is going to say "just post a support ticket and the situation should be resolved". I shouldn't have to fucking post a support ticket to bring a zilean who goes 0/22 IN A RANKED GAME to justice. I shouldn't have to check a player's op.gg to make sure that Riot does their job. This is absolutely ridiculous. And to think people believe that the justice system is fine despite the fact that players are being perma banned for saying "noob", while players that literally int in a ranked game are allowed to go free because a swear is easier to detect by a robot. 

Fix your game.

EDIT:

People want proof. Last Avatarname posted these from op.gg 

https://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fimgur.com%2FGNvoAK2s.png&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150

https://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fimgur.com%2FfO6qoG4s.png&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150

replies.body: Sounds like you reported him correctly. If you think he needs a look at by support, hit up a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
haha good joke friend

This was Zileans build.
https://i.imgur.com/GNvoAK2.png
This is his death map.
https://i.imgur.com/fO6qoG4.png

This guys was very clearly inting and I feel that the op has all right to be mad that this wasn't caught.

He both had no items and 22 deaths at the end of the game, this should be really easy to pick up on.

Even if the poster is kinda mad about it he has the full right to be, please stop downvoting him like he did anything wrong here.

> [{quoted}](name=Last avatarname,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=A2mkxzgs,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-06-27T09:47:07.491+0000)
>
> This was Zileans build.
> https://i.imgur.com/GNvoAK2.png
> This is his death map.
> https://i.imgur.com/fO6qoG4.png
> 
> This guys was very clearly inting and I feel that the op has all right to be mad that this wasn't caught.
> 
> He both had no items and 22 deaths at the end of the game, this should be really easy to pick up on.
> 
> Even if the poster is kinda mad about it he has the full right to be, please stop downvoting him like he did anything wrong here.

People are convinced that trolls don't exist, only bad players, and OP is just a salty boi. That's why he's downvoted.
Well, then players are stupid from time to time.

> [{quoted}](name=Last avatarname,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=A2mkxzgs,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2018-06-27T14:38:47.806+0000)
>
> Well, then players are stupid from time to time.

Only from time to time? I think you meant to say **all the time** :P
I like to pretend I still believe in humanity somewhat.

> [{quoted}](name=Last avatarname,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=A2mkxzgs,comment-id=00070000000000000000,timestamp=2018-06-27T20:23:15.940+0000)
>
> I like to pretend I still believe in humanity somewhat.

At least you're pretending ahhaha

We actually don't pay Riot. >.> 

If you are trying to imply we do because rp purchases, need I remind you that is strictly a voluntary thing.

> [{quoted}](name=Imperial Pandaa,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=A2mkxzgs,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-06-27T04:15:00.691+0000)
>
> We actually don't pay Riot. >.> 
> 
> If you are trying to imply we do because rp purchases, need I remind you that is strictly a voluntary thing.

It's a business method. RIOT is not a charity. You need a remind yourself sells it's products and services. If you haven't notice yet, every time you buy RP you always get a receipt.

And when you donate items to charity you can get a receipt too.

I never said they were a charity though. All i did say was purchases are completely voluntary. They lease us skins and what not. Playing on there servers is free though.

If you actually read the ToS, you'd know that you are legally donating money.

They are giving you RP as thanks.

you're lying. i searched your games, youve had a few games with a zilean, none that went 0/22/..... i always check match histories after my game to see maybe if that person has played the champ before and see if he has a history of having a looott of deaths in order for me to report that.
Don't call people out unless you search thoroughly.
I found it. 10 days ago. Op was Orianna and the match after was a Riven.

Ok never mind i found it, i deeply apologize for calling out OP for being a liar. I literally could not find it whatsoever. But when you said 10 days ago and the champ he played actually made that search a whole lot easier for me to find it. I am very very sorry  @WrÆth  for calling you a liar, i really hope you can forgive me for saying that.
Could have been on a smurf account
because insulting or swearing is not like feeding... feeding is much more allowed than insulted , when you flame you make others flame with you unlike the the feeding . good luck tho
Lol idgaf if he swore at me the entire game. That doesn't waste my time and LP. What does waste my time is a zilean making a game literally unwinnable and then refusing to ff at 15.
Then he probably got a chat restriction, which you wouldn't be able to see proof of.
A chat restriction for a zilean who said nothing except “I’m trolling” and ran it down all game. Justice.

First of all, I was responding to what I thought was you saying, "he swore at me all game." Swearing at teammates earns chat restrictions, that is normal. I see now you were not saying that though, you were saying you couldn't care less if he did swear at you. My mistake.

That said, you're not entitled to justice, Riot took whatever action they felt was appropriate. They are under no obligation to tell you what they did. It has been over a month since whatever happened happened. If you're still obsessed over it then the troll won. Let it go dude, you deserve to be happy, which you cannot achieve as long as you're obsessing over an asshole you don't even know that you met once over the internet.

If there is no reprucussions for inting, than ranked literally loses all meaning. 

You don’t understand, I’m not entitled to justice, but by allowing a troll to waste 30 minutes of me and 3 other people’s time and allowing him to go unpunished than what’s preventing me or anyone else from doing the same on a much larger scale? 

It’s a fundamental flaw in the system. A game loses its meaning if intentionally losing is considered acceptable.

That's the thing, though. Intentionally losing is _not_ considered acceptable. It _does_ get punished. Sometimes the system mis-identifies one behavior as another, it's not perfect. But to think that Riot considers inting acceptable is just stupid.
ye maybe

> [{quoted}](name=BEST MEAT BALLS,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=A2mkxzgs,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-27T04:13:08.289+0000)
>
> because insulting or swearing is not like feeding... feeding is much more allowed than insulted , when you flame you make others flame with you unlike the the feeding . good luck tho

but inting can also make people flame.
not the same as when you insult

> the job that they get PAYED BY US to do

You don't pay Riot to do anything. 

> players are being perma banned for saying "noob"

I'd be interested to see this, got a link?

> players that literally int in a ranked game are allowed to go free because a swear is easier to detect by a robot

Obviously you already know the reason why inting takes longer to punish - what do you propose to speed it up, keeping in mind there are literally hundreds of thousands of games played per day?

> [{quoted}](name=Aneirin,realm=OCE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=A2mkxzgs,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-06-27T04:15:55.818+0000)
>
> You don't pay Riot to do anything. 
> 
> I'd be interested to see this, got a link?
> 
> Obviously you already know the reason why inting takes longer to punish - what do you propose to speed it up, keeping in mind there are literally hundreds of thousands of games played per day?

If they don't get paid by customers, then how they get millions? They take loans from banks to monetize tourneys ? There are different ways to pay and RIOT customers pays by buying skins.

You only read half the sentence. If we pay money for skins, all that obligates them to do is provide the skin. We don't pay anyone to deal with trolls. Obviously it's in their best interests to do so, but don't come in here with a I PAY YOUR SALARY SO I'M YOUR BOSS attitude.

> [{quoted}](name=WrÆth,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=A2mkxzgs,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-06-27T04:07:35.026+0000)
>
> And no, person I know is going to say &quot;just post a support ticket and the situation should be resolved&quot;. I shouldn&#039;t have to fucking post a support ticket to bring a zilean who goes 0/22 IN A RANKED GAME to justice.

I agree with everything except this. If you really wanted him reported you should submit a ticket. Doesn't matter if it shouldn't be that way because it currently is. Robot can rarely detect this. Does not mean their game is broken. Support is there for a reason and looking at their game play results in them usually realizing that people like Zilean are inting. Letting him go because you feel that you should not have to only reinforces this person's idea that he can get away with it.

>And no, person I know is going to say "just post a support ticket and the situation should be resolved". I shouldn't have to fucking post a support ticket to bring a zilean who goes 0/22 IN A RANKED GAME to justice.

Punishments aren't issued automatically for 'feeding' because the system literally cannot tell the difference between intentional feeding or just a bad game.

Submitting a ticket forces a real person to review the game at least.

You don’t know if he received a warning or what not. What if that’s was the first report for inting they really submitted? People shouldn’t receive a ban, unless they cross some serious toxic lines, for having one game where they fed a lot. Especially since people cry inting when someone has like 3 deaths.

This is actually a pretty bad case. If it gets manually reviewed, I wouldn't be surprised if it was punished as the Zil in question sold items and bought swifty's at 7 minutes and then sold that by minute 11 before just running the remaining 17 minutes of the game (was 28 minutes) with no items.

This definitely should've been an insta perma. I'm not going to post his op.gg because that's against board rules, but if you check his profile he has other games where he runs it down on zilean and singed. If he didn't get picked up the game I reported him, then he definetly should've gotten banned the 3rd or 4th time he did it.
Riot: He was having a bad game, stop talking about it or YOU get banned.

As someone who doesn't ever take kills when I'm support unless I'm playing certain champions so I typically go 0-anything on most support games,

{{sticker:katarina-love}}

I was looking at his match history, I feel reporting him wont get him the ban though because even though he went 0-22 even if intentional he does not do it all the time. He does have bad game i will admit to that. I honestly probably would have reported him for that game as well. But because riot can be very stingy on who gets a ban or even a suspension, im not sure he will get that, unfortunately. I myself have had my fair share of pretty bad players, so I can definitely see where you are coming from though.
